briefTitle: FIasp® vs. Novolog® in Type 1 Diabetics Using 670G Medtronic Pump
officialTitle: An Exploratory, Single-center, Randomized, Open Label, Active-control, Cross-over Trial Comparing the Efficacy and Safety of Continuous Subcutaneous Insulin Infusion of Faster-acting Insulin Aspart (Fiasp®) Compared to NovoLog® Used in the Medtronic 670G Closed Loop System in Adults With Type 1 Diabetes

interventions.name: 670G hybrid closed loop continuous subcutaneous insulin infusion system

summary: This is an exploratory, single-center, randomized, open label, active-controlled, complete cross-over trial comparing safety and efficacy of Fiasp® versus NovoLog® when used in the Medtronic MiniMed 670G system in subjects with T1DM.
